function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poorly designed hospital spaces that do not consider infectious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and ineffective patient care","Mitigation":"Integrate infectious disease considerations into building designs and operational procedures","Technologies":"Building Information Modeling (BIM) and computational fluid dynamics (CFD) for airflow modeling","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare administrators, building operators, designers, architects"},{"Description":"Lack of integrated thermal space conditioning and ventilation provisions","Impact":"Inefficient energy use and potential for air-borne disease spread","Mitigation":"Separate thermal space conditioning from ventilation provisions to improve energy efficiency and reduce disease transmission","Technologies":"Building design with integrated thermal and ventilation systems","People":"Building operators, designers, architects","Owner":"Healthcare administrators, building operators"},{"Description":"Inadequate triaging and examination procedures for patients with infectious disease symptoms","Impact":"Increased exposure to other patients and potential for disease spread","Mitigation":"Implement triage and examination protocols to reduce exposure and separate patients with infectious disease symptoms","Technologies":"Digital simulation techniques for space utilization and flow management","People":"Healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare administrators, healthcare workers"}]}
